sentence.Network_en: She truned him down like a bedspread.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对他翻了脸,就像把床罩翻过来一样.

sentence.Network_en: Mother raised the roof when she saw the dog's muddy foot prints on her new bedspread.
sentence.Network_cn: 看见新床单上有狗的泥脚印时,妈妈大发雷霆.

sentence.Network_en: In the act of going he stayed to straighten the bedspread.
sentence.Network_cn: 他边往外走,边停下脚来抻了抻被子.

entry.def: A bedspread is a decorative cover which is put over a bed, on top of the sheets and blankets.
